channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Belisha beacon and pole not working, 21st December
item.description:
Belisha beacon and pole not working on school side of the crossing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alsike Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven brick paving, 21st December
item.description:
The bricks used for the road-side pavement surface have become uneven. There's a danger of tripping into the road. I wonder why the council used bricks here and if it would be better (or maybe there's a plan) to replace them with paving slabs matching those alongside. Technically, once the paving subsides, this would mean fewer edges as trip hazards.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wilson Road, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter and leaves, 21st December
item.description:
Chalkpit avenue from the junction with main road to no.2 chalkpit avenue on both sides of the road its heavily littered and covered in leaves can you please sweep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1B, Chalk Pit Avenue, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping outside 51 Maury garage, 21st December
item.description:
Once again a pile of flytipping - household items, clothing, etc - outside the garage of 51 Maury. This is a recurring problem.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Maury Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Another pothole is opening up by the junction of Hollingworth Road and Rolleston Avenue, close to the one that has already been reported. Can both be fixed at the same time please?, 21st December
item.description:
The road surface is in a very bad state, with 2 potholes close together.

item.title: Litter on Tabard street, 21st December
item.description:
There is food waste, fast food packaging, plastic bottles, plastic bags and cans left on the pavement and the road on Tabard Street near the rental bikes. Despite, fixmystreet stating it has been removed today, the litter is still there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tabard Street, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: By the basketball court, 21st December
item.description:
There used to be a cleaner that would come to clean everything around the basketball court and also around the parking zone, now since July nobody comes to clean the area, bear in mind kids come to play here and there's always rubbish inside the court.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hoxton Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead bird in front of the building, 21st December
item.description:
While walking I saw a dead pigeon bird in front of Danny McCarthy Court in Rotherhithe. I don't live there. I didn't take a picture of the bird but it is located on the street where people are passing close to the entrance of the building.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4A, Odessa Street, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
